reviews.text: Beautiful & quick service! Good food for a simple lunch/dinner! Favorite local spots, couldnt ask for anything less!
We have just recently started working back in our offices one day a week and I am not mad that this little place is just a block or so away! Will definitely...
I noticed this open when we were taking our daughter to school, but it's a bit out of my way. And downtown parking isn't always easy. So, I put off coming...
